Q0.Title: Meet your Boss
Q0.Description: Head to the Ministry of Energy office in the Party HQ and talk to your boss.

Objectives.Objective 1: Locate and speak with your boss.

Q1.Title: Meet the General
Q1.Description: General Butunov can be found at the military base, or in his office at the Party Headquarters.

Objectives.Objective 1: Locate and speak with General Butunov

Q2.Title: Locate Vladostovovitch's Missing Dossier
Q2.Description: Vlad has lost sensitive information. Find it before it's too late.

Q3.Title: Speak to all the Ministers
Q3.Description: Get to know those in charge.

Q4.Title: Blackmail Petya Belov
Q4.Description: Rumors have been floating around that Petya has been associating with the international burgeouise.

Objectives.Objective 1: Obtain 50% Loyalty with at least one Minister.
